education.title: The Maharaja Sayajirao University of Baroda
education.description: after accomplishing masters from India's renowned Art School, we have decided to give different way to design and creativity. with this hope we have started Badhuche (everything is here). we launched our first product - Hand Painted T shirts. with the extreme care and attendance of the details. Our second product was highly customised Badges and then- Hand painted - Ballerina s , Hand Painted Canvas Shoes. and many more to come.
